name: Stupid Pixels: March Towards Mass Destruction Lite
name_original: Stupid Pixels: March Towards Mass Destruction Lite
description:
Introducing the lite version of Stupid Pixels: March Towards Mass Destruction.

Stupid Pixels are stupid, and need your help to make it to safety. Alter the world to create a route for the Stupid Pixels to make it to safety. Includes 100 levels.

Controlling your army of Stupid Pixels, the aim is to get as many as you can to the exit point of a level. Your goal is to arrange the moveable items in each level to create a safe path for the Stupid Pixels to make it through. Help these Stupid Pixels survive.

Included in the lite version of the app:

• 20 CHALLENGING LEVELS
Stretch your strategies across 20 levels as you lead your Stupid Pixels across an immense variety of challenging levels. The full version contains 100 levels across 5 worlds.

• REAL PHYSICS AND LEVEL VARIETY
Each level incorporates real physics and includes high variety of different scenarios. Don't let the Stupid Pixels fall to their doom!

• STUPID PIXELS
You thought pixels would be smart?

Download Stupid Pixels: March Towards Mass Destruction today!
